Blog.post: Hey all. wow im really slackin on the posts, huh? sorry, to any of you who actually read this. Life's been kinda blah but stressful at the same time...hate it when that happens. Grades are coming out...aaahhhh. i really need a 3.0. dont laugh!!! thats good for me, and i need it. so yea, *fingers crossed.* Omg EVERYONE is hooking up, its insane. And i dont have anyone :( and i really want someone. argh. o well. hopefully someone will come along. :-/. Yea and one of these new couples i like cant stand lookin at cuz...yea personal reasons. lets just say that im a little too jealous. ok, a lot too jealous. *sigh* welllll....gotta get some homework done before friends comes on!!! YAY!!! bye.
Wanted: Tall muscular guy who can play ACDC for me on the guitar and who will hold me all night long. Currently accepting applications.

I hate it when your relationship with someone like totally changes, especially when you were such good friends with that person. it totally sucks. i hate losing friends. god, y do people have to change??? arg. I just talked to the person and it was like we had nothing to talk about, and they annoy me now, and im sure i annoy them, and its like a little while ago we were such good friends. its really sad. I love her, but now its like i love who she used to be, and it's hard to be friends with who she is now. *sigh* oh well... c'est la vie, right? and now im sitting at home bored as hell with nothing to do on a perfectly good saturday night. blah. sucks suck sucks. and even if i had something to do I'd have no one to take me. I NEED A DRIVERS LICENSE SO DAMN BAD!!! aaaahhhh. Oh, if anyone knows how to make it so that people can leave comments on here then tell me. thanks.

HAHA how funny is that??? yea i thought it was funny. and tonight i may go to a party, i havent decided yet. dude, i need my license sooo bad, 2 weeks from monday!!!! its like im a burden to hang out with now cuz whoever i am hanging out with has to drive me everywhere. lol. oh well. well, steph is gonna be here any minute, sooo..... bye!

Hola. my daily update. this thing is kinda cool i guess...i wonder if anyone reads it. if you do then tell me, cuz i dont wanna be like talking to myself here.... Anyway...today was a normal day. then i went to dinner with a couple of friends at chevys...that was fun :) and YAY sadies got pushed back a month so i have another month till i have to freaking ask someone. im not really stressing, i just dont want to do it cuz its a drag. o well, i wanna go..soooo.... yes, anyway, this is short, but i need to get to my homework. SO ill talk to all you fine people later. MWAH :)

Hey all! ya today was a good day... had PSATs this morning (boring, but not too bad) so i had the rest of the afternoon free. went to the creamery and had lunch with some friends, that was tons of fun. oh and rebeccas bf came so i met him. i guess hes a fine guy, but not really bf material, at least not up to par on my standards. o well, if shes happy then i guess good for her. then i went to reginas and hung out, and then went to the soccer game. and now im putting off hw. Ugh, so we were talking about saides earlier, and i have no one to ask. its very sad. the only person that i kinda want to i cant so yea i dont know. but i hate sadies. here is my philosophy on the whole thing: it takes away womens rights!!! thats right, steals em!! see, the only good part (well pretty much the only good part) of bein a girl is that we arent expected to ask the guys out, thats their job. and here comes sadies, takin that away!!! now what do we have left??? nothing. ugh. but im not gonna go single, and i think all my friends r going, so i better find me a guy to ask. any volunteers??? Well, off to do hw. blech. talk to u all later! mwah :)

Hey all! decided to start one of these, at the urging of a dear friend...thanks nornie :). anyway, weird name, i know, it was inspired by jersey...dont ask. so yes, hello all!!! i pity you for reading this because it must mean that you are so bored that you have nothing else to do...but while you are hear, yay thank you for reading :). well, i dont quite know what to say right now... Oh, so my mom and sister just got back from a college fair (i was too lazy to go :-/) and my mom brought me back all this stuff and a few colleges look really cool, esspecially clark and davidson. And Clark is in new york, which is awesome cuz thats where i really want to go to college, and it looks like maybe i can acctually get in!!...so yes, yay! Speaking of college...PSATs tomorrow...which means no hw tonight. saaaweeeeet!! well, im off, ill write more later! mwah!

Hey! the curse of the relatives is still upon me, but only for one more day!!! (well then it will just be a relative i really like so thats ok.) i guess i shouldnt complain cuz i dont see them that often but aaahh. i guess i didnt really post about thanksgiving...it was fine, the fights were kept to a minimum, considering everyone was in the same room for an extended period of time...so that was good. lol when i was little i always wanted to sit at the adult table, and this yr there were no kids so there was only an adults table, and wow, let me tell u, mashed potato fights and turkey jokes made up by a 5 yr old r so much more fun. but, alas, there was josh *sigh* (hes the hot guy from my last post) and damn good cheescake, not to mention awesome turkey, so i cant complain. all in all it was pretty good. today we went to san jose to go to the art museum. my mom works there and we always have to go there when family comes. i hate it, im so not a modern art person. so my sisters and i kinda hung out in the gift shop and i talked on my cell phone. then we went to santana row, but we didnt really do anything there, so then we came home. and then i took a nap. pretty boring day... well, i must go deal with my camera happy grandfather now. ill ttyl

AND he went to tisch (performing arts school at NYU where i want to go!) so he gave me pointers to get in and stuff. and that also means hes an actor! and hes sooo funny. and yea. i just thought id share.
HAPPY TURKEY DAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hey! whats shakin. happy turkey day! well tomorrow. acctually i guess today cuz its almost 1. well a bunch of relitives r here...thats always interesting. it was acctually going surprisingly well until dinner tonight...o well. last night lauren came and got me and i slept at her house. that was tons of fun and i got to escape for a while, so it was cool. the full monty is so funny!!! well i only saw the first half cuz then i fell asleep but it was funny so far!!! sooo...i dont really have much to say...i just thought id post. I hope everyone has an AWESOME thanksgiving!!! mwah

yo yo yo sup me homies. nothin much here...started soccer officially today. im not as bad as i thot id be, but im still pretty damn bad. its fun tho. so yay. the entire east coast is in my living room...well ok just a few relatives but believe u me, when my whole family gets together it seems like a lot more people than it really is. and none of my cousins are coming!!! ugh that defeats the purpous of thanksgiving. :(. today kinda sucked, hard apes test KICKED MY ASS!! o well. yay everyone told me i was really good in the play today. i love hearin that im really good at something cuz sometimes it seems like im not really good at anything. and i know they were prolly just saying that, but still its nice to think that i might acctually have some real talent in something! wellllll, off to do some history reading. ill talk to all u lovely people later

I found a line and then it grew I found myself still thinking of you I felt so empty and now I'm fine But still it's burning, when will you be mine? Too much of the same stories in our lives I think it's time for change, don't you? Too much of the same stories in our lives I think it's time for us to walk away from here Look at me still in your mind Our memories so intertwined Well you broke through and found your way And so did I no need to stay The same old picture, tried and true Been through there, lets looking for something new Do you remember lying on the beach so late at night Do you remember running through the sprinklers that night Do you remember all the songs that I have wrote for you I remember,the way you made me feel when I was with you I remember,the smile that always brought me back to you That look in your eyes, I never thought that this could be untrue
finals suck. soccer sucks. fuck, just 4 more days....

hey! another big study day...but this one was good :) i went to D's review, that was good. and then susan and i went to stanford and we studied apes over lunch at uno mas (which we discovered acctually isnt uno mas!!!) for a really long time, and that was awesome. and then we did our xmas shopping. yay. omg i got so many presents, i spent soooo much!! but xmas rocks, what with all the presents and stuff. but HANNUKA IS STILL BETTER!!! lol. well, jsut thought id say hi. im gonna go. adios mis amigos

life sucks. finals suck. studying all day really sucks. spending a day without getting dressed or anything in sometimes a good thing tho :). and now im tired. but im waiting up cuz jen is coming over. crazy girl. she decided to come over at like 12:45. am that is. she should be here by 1:30. good times, good times. Dude i was having this thought. and its kinda weird cuz it came at a time when i hadnt stopped studying for a couple hrs, and now its gonna come out even weirder cuz im tired as hell. but anyway, here goes. so i was listenin to ms payne talk about how she doesnt really see her high school friends anymore yesterday, and i was thinking about that today when i just couldnt take any more apes. and i thought, all my friends now just happen to be the friends i have during this brief period in my life. they rnt my friends as an absolute...just, the friends that i have now that i may never see again. like, thats just weird. cuz these people are my friends, and i cant see myself moving on and having another batch of friends...or the same for them. it seems like a waste almost, and weird that people who are so close can just poof, move on. but really, what if i go to school on the other side of the country from some of my best friends, and we swear to keep in touch, and we email during freshman year of college, and make an effort to see eachother when we r home during the same time, but then we kinda stop having time and pretty soon we arent friends anymore. and i am making NO SENSE. i have no idea what im writting, but bassically it seems like these r gonna be my friends forever, but what if its really just my high school friends who i see at a reunion and im like oh hah wow i remember that person. it just seems weird. and sad. and i need sleep. stop reading this!!!! bye

finals suck ass. ugh, and studying is so boring. my day so far: woke up 1t 9:30 and hung out with jersey jersey left at like 10:15, so then i went back to bed but i couldnt really sleep 11:30 decided to become productive 1:00 acctually become productive its 2:30 and ive been studying spanish for an hr and a half and now im really bored yea so my day has been so boring. and i want to hang out tonight but i think im just gonna stay home and study. my mom wants to go to the movies with me though, so i might take a break and do that, i dont know. anyway, studying is SO much better when u r doing it together, but we didnt have our semi-annual study session at stephs cuz we rnt taking any of the same finals...oh well, tomorrow im gonna go to a history study session and then study apes with susan at starbucks! the best possible way i can think to study apes, so its all good. well, im off to start on a super mega study guide for apes. wish me luck, and if i dont return, check under the mountain of papers and books on my bed to make sure im still breathing.

what a day...what a day... so i got home today and i got my PSAT scroes, and i got the equivilant if like a 1230!!! im soooo stoked!! dude but better yet, i got in the 99th percentile in writting!!!!!! dude, ive never been the BEST at anything, lol but i got better (or equal to) everyone in writting!!! and like 95% all in all of all college bound seniors. so yea i was really happy and like jumping around stuff. lol. And then there was the dance. it was ok, it had its moments. Like dancing on the block to ACDC with katie and chintz, lol that was so much fun, and yea. but it wasnt great. and then i got kinda pissed right there in the middle...lol...but we wont talk about that :-p And now Jersey is here. we just had this convo where we both just started crying. lol we r such a depressed bunch...but oh well, it was kinda good. got some stuff out of our systems. Well, i guess id better get some sleep, cuz i have a whole weekend of cramming to do, startin early tomorrow (well, early for me, which means before like noon, lol) AAAHHHH FINALS AAAAHHHHH well on that note, goodnight and happy studying everyone.

grrr!!! being sick sucks!!! i slept for 19 hrs today tho, lol, that was cool. but i feel like shit and i missed school the week before finals!!! not cool!! so now im totally stressing. blah. but its all ok because im going to not so silent night on friday!!!! woo hoo!!!!!! well assuming that i get better and we can work out the issue of getting up there. but yea, rancid and offspring!!! woo hoo!!! all of u ppl going to sadies suck, cuz the concert is gonna be so much better. yay we won our game. 3-1, woo hoo. lol i totally shouldnt have played tho. as if i wasnt sick enough, now i have a worse cough and im gettin chills and im losing my voice. blah...i cannot miss school. oh well... but better news, my mom had coffee with sarahs mom today. (for those of u who dont know sarah is my best friend of 8 yrs who was shipped off to one of those reform boarding schools and i havent seen her or heard from her in like 7 or 8 months. bassically hell). anyway my mom had coffee with her mom even tho she is still all pissed at her and probably always will be, but just so she could get info about sarah. apparently we can start writting eachother in january. i cant see her until september tho. thats almost a yr, making a grand total of a yr and a half without seeing her. thats horrible, i can even explain. but at least we can start writting soon...and my mom got me some pictures of her which is good. oh and apparently in english she had to write a paper about someone important in her life and she chose me, and she has 8 pages about me so far. lol, its good to hear that she still thinks about me cuz sometimes i wonder if maybe shes moved on and doesnt really think about me ne more, whereas i think about her and miss her so much, all the time. god i really just need her in my life right now. like really bad. *sigh* c'est la vie, i guess...as much as it sucks. well, off to drown myself in tea to try to get better!!! mwah

Every time we lie awake; After every hit we take. Every feeling that I get; But I haven't missed you yet. Every room mate kept awake; by every sigh and scream we make All the feelings that I get; But I still don't miss you yet Only when I stop to think about it. I hate everything about you, why do I, love you?

kill me. just fucking kill me.

ALOHA!! whats shakin people. Nothing much here, had service day today. We went to a homeless shelter and helpped out. It always kinda makes me sad going to those places, esspecially when i see kids, cuz i cant imagine how horrible it would be to grow up like that, without a home. And the kids were sooo cute!!! i went into the daycare center and these little kids, they were prolly about 3, started laughing and talking to me, and they were like r u a mommy?? do u have a kid?? and i was like no. and this other one was like do u have a mommy? and i was like yup. and then he was like do u have a daddy? and i was like yup. and then he was like lucky, i dont. it was soo sad, this was the cutest little kid. yea but it was fun, and the kids were so happy to just have me sit down and talk to them. unfortunately talking to the kids wasnt what i was supposed to be doing so i didnt get to for that long. so i organized a food closet (fun but a lot more stressful than it sounds!!!! lol) omg there were so many rasins, it was INSANE!! and then jen and guilly and i came up with and put together some art projects for kids for tonight. that was cool. Jen is gonna make a great kindergarden teacher some day, lol. I hope that doing all this good work today gave me some karma so that somebody up there has decided that its ok to let me pass my drivers test tomorrow! ITS HIGH FUCKING TIME!!! i hope third time is the charm, because if i fail three times that is just ABSURD, not to mention i have to go back to drivers ed. but we wont talk about that. because im gonna pass. well, i have hella work to do so i need to get going. Later!

Romantic, hopeful, and composed. You are the Sonnet. Get it? Composed? Sonnets want Love and have high ideals about it. They're conscientious people, caring & careful. You yourself have deep convictions, and you devote a lot of thought to romance and what it should be. This will frighten away most potential mates, but that's okay, because you're very choosy with your affections anyway. You'd absolutely refuse to date someone dumber than you, for instance. Lovers who share your idealized perspective, or who are at least willing to totally throw themselves into a relationship, will be very, very happy with you. And you with them. You're already selfless and compassionate, and with the right partner, there's no doubt you can be sensual, even adventurously so. You probably have lots of female friends, and they have a special soft spot for you. Babies do, too, at the tippy-top of their baby skulls. hmm...interesting... i am sick, and that sucks. and so does this fucking english paper. baaaahhh been in bed all day, and this paper is getting no where. i guess ill go finish it and probably fall asleep while trying to do so. adios

hey!! im back from spain. it was sooo awesome! so much fun. i had a blast. did sooo much. sightseeing, shopping (thanks leila for showing me h&m!!!) hanging out, lot of eating, hehe. spanish tortilla and paella (sp?) is soo good. lot of fish and pork tho, not really my cup of tea. we started in madrid, and there we went to some museums and then hung out and shopped and did some sighteeing. then we went to toledo. toledo was this gorgeous old little town, reminded me a lot of italy. then after we went to granada... granada rocked, it was this little town with all these little tea shops and stands and stuff, and the alhambra, this old arab castle, was cool. then we went to sevilla. awesome town, so much shopping and stuff to do. then cordoba...saw a mosque, did some shopping and walkin around...pretty cool. then we took an overnight train to barcelona. i loved barcelona...soooo much to do. so much culture and then las ramblas, the big shopping street was awesome. some sketchy people there tho...i dont know about some of them. but yea, sooo much fun. hehe and its really cool cuz the legal age there is 16...didnt drink or ne thing tho...of course not im a good girl 0:-) i want to study abroad over there or something. so yes, it rocked so much. and now im dirty and tired from a 2 hr and then another 11 hr plane ride...tho i slept most of the 11 hr one. i dont know y planes make u tired even when u sleep. o well. im off. hasta luego!

Along the edges, colors blur it seemed familiar. While you read your magazine, I was counting all the markers. And California seemed to draw you like a siren From a postcard, in a letter, or a frame of film melting. Under you, I feel your breath move in, out slowly. Under you, let go completely feeling you take over me. Take over me. A Hollywood flat where we'd laugh about our fortunes Well we had jobs in this bar down at 3rd and San Vicente. And Ramen Noodles at 4:30 in the morning, When we barely could survive, I was never more alive. Under you, I feel your blood flowing out slowly. Under you, let go completely feeling you take over me. Take over me. You moved in slow degrees A sudden memory You're a Leonard Cohen song But every now and then I'd swear I see you standing on a sidewalk, In a restaurant, from a taxi passing by. Under you I feel your breath move in, out slowly. Under you let go completely feeling you take over me. Take over me

so i had to go to my aunt's funeral today. it was really sad. i didnt think i was gonna get overly emotional because i wasnt that close to her but i got really sad. i think it had mostly to do with all the people i am close to crying and stuff. but yea. it was sad, as to be expected of a funeral... then i hung out with my cousins during the reception. and talked to my uncle who is in social work and said he will give me a job when i finish college! woot! we will see if that holds true in 5 years but yea. woah, 5 years??? 5 years and im done with school and will have a career??? no way. ok thats weird. then i went bowling tonight with jen and jon and becca. good times, as always. dancing around and bowling extremely badly (though i would have won the 4th game if evil jon hadnt gotten a strike at the LAST MINUTE!!! bah!) then we went to dennys for a minight snack, and now jen is here and we are chillin. like a villian. becca is passed out on the chair in her room and jen is in the kitchen eating penut butter. tomorrow (well... today.... but yea) i have to pack and shit and then i leave thursday am!!! aaaaahhh!! ok well thats bout it. oh jen doesnt like the red in my hair. that makes me sad. o well it washes out in 6-12 washes. now thats it. arivadichi!!

lazy day. slept till 3. very nice. then hung out with jen for a bit, and then went to dinner with regina and becca at fosters freeze. then regina and i went to the batting cages! it was so much fun!! lol i wore a catchers helmet with one of those face masks cuz i was scared a ball would hit me. i looked funny :-p we were really bad but it was really fun. then we went to reginas house and put red streaks in my hair. we were gonna do her tips but never got around to that. then fuckin drama with jason. well it didnt have to be drama but knowin me it was. i thought it was too much trouble to be mad at him, and now it seems its too much trouble to forgive him. whatever. guys suck. then regina decided we had to hang out with him which was altogether too akward after talking to him. but yea. whatever. i dont care anymore. i have to go to my great aunt's funeral tomorrow in palm springs. :( its kinda late and i should probably get some sleep, but i dont want to. maybe ill go watch 10 things i hate about you. i miss zach so much. im not gonna last 6 more weeks without him. *tear*

Breathe in for luck, breathe in so deep, this air is blessed, you share with me. This night is wild, so calm and dull, these hearts they race, from self control. Your legs are smooth, as they graze mine, we're doing fine, we're doing nothing at all. My hopes are so high, that your kiss might kill me. So won't you kill me, so I die happy. My heart is yours to fill or burst, to break or bury, or wear as jewelery, which ever you prefer. The words are hushed lets not get busted; just lay entwined here, undiscovered. Safe in here from all the stupid questions. "hey did you get some?" Man, that is so dumb. Stay quiet, stay near, stay close they can't hear... so we can get some. My hopes are so high that your kiss might kill me. So won't you kill me, so I die happy. My heart is yours to fill or burst, to break or bury, or wear as jewelery, which ever you prefer. Hands down this is the best day I can ever remember, I'll always remember the sound of the stereo, the dim of the soft lights, the scent of your hair that you twirled in your fingers and the time on the clock when we realized it's so late and this walk that we shared together. The streets were wet and the gate was locked so I jumped it, and I let you in. And you stood at your door with your hands on my waist and you kissed me like you meant it. And I knew that you meant it, that you meant it

so im pickin up where jen left off (hi, its sara now). so anyway, she didnt finish talking about that one stupd hole... this stupid site only lets u post a little at a time. so anyway. i bowl my ball (after hitting it in the water 3 times) and am all excited that it made it over the stupid bridge. so i look up and see jen bounding backward, inches away from the water, golf club in hand, yelling "ILL SAVE IT!! COME BACK YOU DAMNED BALL!!" so this was all too much. so i plop down on my ass in the middle of the hole, (in the puddle the whole fiasco created none the less) and im laughing hysterically and im like I... HAVE... TO... PEE!!! but i was laughin so hard i couldnt get up. wow, lots of weird stares. so we FINALLY finish this hole, and on the next. so this next hole is one of those windmill things. and see you have to just get it over this hump and hit the windmill and then ur ball comes rolling out underneath (these caused some issues, namely not beng able to find the place where our balls came out, but thats another story) so anyway, on this windmill one, there is this little door in the windmill and if you make it in there its a hole in one. not an easy feat mind you. so jen, thinking she was safe seeing how badly i was playing, was like if you get it in that little door, you can have a hole in zero!! so what do i do? I HIT IT IN THE DOOR ON MY FIRST TRY!!! yea, it was awesome. so i get a hole in zero. haha and then the people who started like half an hour after us caught up to us (yea we were playing pretty slowly what with all the interuptions and rule changes. see, jen plays where if you hit it out of bounds u get to start back at the begining and ur back at one. so i hit it out on like my 8th try (yes most people play where you stop at 6... we play where u stop at 15... and then we started playing where if you get to 15 you can start counting backwards) so yea i hit it out and what happens? i put it back at the begining and im back at my first hit. good rule.) so ANYWAY these people caught up to us so we needed to start playing faster.... oh yea and then jen is standing in the middle of the hole on the phone and i hit my ball and it totally smacked her in the ankle, and shes like FUCK YOU and we look up and there were a lot of little people there. yea.... so it was fun. except, acctually, it sucked, because the clown left. thats right people, no more clown. if you read all of both of these entries, who the fuck are you and whay dont you have a life???? yea... you can comment, though you you are probably speachless by now ps. jen likes you. she says you are dedicated. :)

ok so weird things happen when Sara and I hang out. Take Golfland for example. Miniature golfing, good ol' family fun....fun for everyone really. You'd think that Golfland would be safe from us. You really would....but they made one vital mistake...yes, yes my friends they made a bridge. With water. Underneath it. BIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIG MISTAKE BUDDY! So sara and i are just playin a nice friendly game of golf when all of hte sudden we find ourselves at this watery hole. So I go and hit it over np. Then there was Sara. Sara my freinds has "issues" with hitting the ball and not the astroturf. In fact, from now on we'll have to call her one wrist sara due to an unfortunate golfing incident. When she did hit it though, she hit it in the water and went "fishing". Like literally. The ball went under the bridge and what does sara do? Use her hand to get it out you say? Yea, wrong. She uses her golf club and says "Im going fishing" Really now. Then she gets to start over back at one cause see I play that if you hit it out of bounds you get to start over. I think its ingenius, most think it cheating. To hte latter I say fuck you! Ok so anyway I suggest to Sara to bowl it over, so she goes throws back her arm and lets that sucker fly. Well, unfortuanetly she let it fly a little too hard and so it went over but hit hte back of the course and then came barreling back towards hte bridge. Seeing its immediate danger I went barreling over, golf club at the ready...like a hockey player i was....except that in tryin to rescues sara's shot I forgot that I would be rrunning over a bridge and as such almost fell in to the little river. Luckily though time slowed down in one of those RUUUUN FOOOOOOREEEEESSSSTTTT RUN moments and I saved my ass and sara's ball. It was brilliant, bloody brilliant.
